item.title: positive technologies
item.description: positive technologies # Like many, I find myself troubled by modern technology. It is easy to get caught up in these systems that are eroding our way of life, but I want to focus on the positive impacts of technology for a bit. There are ways technology improves our lives, and they are worth recognizing. Technology Positive Impact OpenStreetMap Provides accessible mapping data for everyone, enabling better navigation and community planning.
